item.title: By: Yusuf Odukoya
item.dc:creator: Yusuf Odukoya
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://branditechture.agency/how-to-optimize-your-facebook-profile-for-quality-leads/#comment-1346">Patience</a>.
Yes, it's the best thing to do. So that old friends and ex colleagues can still find you through your maiden name.
I hope that helps.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Patience.

Yes, it’s the best thing to do. So that old friends and ex colleagues can still find you through your maiden name.

I hope that helps.

item.title: By: Patience
item.dc:creator: Patience
item.description: Please can a married woman use her changed name and have her old name in bracket
item.content:encoded: Please can a married woman use her changed name and have her old name in bracket

item.title: By: Poovanesh
item.dc:creator: Poovanesh
item.description: Very helpful post. Used it to optimize my profile. Not complete as yet but this was such a thorough post and so easy to follow.
item.content:encoded: Very helpful post. Used it to optimize my profile. Not complete as yet but this was such a thorough post and so easy to follow.

item.title: By: webconnector
